ravenswood_entrance.description: You stand at the entrance of Ravenswood. The iron gates creak in the wind, and an unsettling silence permeates the air. The main street leads deeper into the town.

old_road.description: The road back to civilization stretches southward. Overgrown weeds and abandoned carts suggest that few have traveled this way recently.

main_street.description: Shops and houses line the deserted main street. Windows are boarded up, and shadows seem to move in the corners of your vision.

abandoned_inn.description: The inn's sign hangs precariously, swinging slowly despite the lack of wind. Inside, the smell of decay mixes with faint whispers.

inn_attic.description: Dust and cobwebs cover the attic. Moonlight filters through broken shingles, casting eerie patterns on the floor.

hidden_cellar.description: A secret cellar beneath the inn. Old barrels and crates are scattered around, and a cold draft hints at another exit.

underground_tunnel.description: A damp, narrow tunnel that seems to stretch endlessly. The walls are covered in strange markings.

crypt_entrance.description: An ominous stone doorway stands before you, leading into the crypts beneath Ravenswood.

ancient_crypt.description: The crypt is filled with tombs and the air is thick with the scent of decay. Shadows flicker in the corners.

forgotten_chamber.description: An ancient chamber hidden deep within the crypt. Strange symbols adorn the walls, and a dark presence can be felt.

town_square.description: The once-vibrant town square is now empty. A statue of the town's founder stands in the center, but its eyes seem to follow you.

old_library.description: The library is filled with dusty books and cobwebs. Perhaps some clues can be found among the ancient texts.

cemetery.description: Gravestones jut out of the mist like jagged teeth. The silence here is oppressive, and you feel like you're being watched.

mausoleum.description: An old mausoleum stands at the edge of the cemetery. Its door is ajar, darkness beckoning within.

hidden_catacombs.description: The catacombs stretch beneath the town, filled with the remains of those long forgotten.

underground_lake.description: A vast underground lake blocks your path. The water is black and still, and a narrow ledge skirts the edge.

hidden_cavern.description: A cavern hidden beyond the lake. Strange crystals illuminate the space with an eerie glow.

ravenswood_manor.description: Ravenswood Manor looms ahead, its gothic architecture both grand and foreboding. This is the heart of the town's mystery.

forbidden_tower.description: The tower reaches into the dark sky. It's said to be the source of the town's curse.

haunted_chapel.description: An old chapel stands here, its windows shattered and doors hanging off their hinges. A feeling of despair hangs in the air.

old_lighthouse.description: Perched on a cliff overlooking the sea, the lighthouse no longer shines. Waves crash violently below.

rocky_shore.description: The rocky shore is treacherous. Shipwrecks litter the coast, and the cries of gulls echo hauntingly.
